about-product: Mello is a cloud-based platform that allows you to organize your workspace together with a team or with other users.
desktop: You can also download desktop applications by clicking the button below
mobile: And there is also a mobile cloud storage application
about-description: Mello cloud is a cloud storage that allows users to store and manage their data in a cloud environment. It provides high-level security and data access control functions, as well as guarantees high availability and scalability. The main advantages of Mello cloud are: ·Flexibility and Scalability: Mello cloud allows users to easily scale their storage to meet growing data storage needs, expanding storage capacity as needed. ·Security: Mello cloud provides a high level of data security thanks to data encryption at rest and in motion, traffic filtering and the ability to control access to data at the user level. ·Usability Mello cloud has a simple and intuitive interface that allows users to easily upload, store and manage their data without requiring special knowledge and skills.

activate.successMessage: Your account has been activated. You can now log in.
activate.failedMessage: We couldn’t activate your account. The link may have expired or is invalid.
activate.contactSupport: Please try registering again or contact support for help.
activate.emailSentMessage: We have sent an activation email {{email}} to your registered email address. Please check your inbox to activate your account.
activate.checkSpam: If you didn’t receive the email, please try registering again or check your spam folder.

files.upload-files-text: Click or drag file to this area to upload
files.upload-files-hint: You can upload up to 5 files at the same time. Downloading illegal content is prohibited

messages.start-new-chat: Open a new dialog by selecting a user or starting typing @username
